name: Chicken Hariyali Tikka
author: HEERU
summary: Chicken breast meat is rubbed with an intoxicating paste made with cilantro, mint, and other distinctive flavors. Chicken legs may also be used, or a combination of legs and breasts. This recipe is cooked in the oven, but will work well on the grill. Serve hot with onion rings.
ingredients: ½ cup finely chopped fresh mint leaves
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into chunks
directions: In a large bowl, grind together the cilantro, mint leaves, ginger garlic paste, lemon juice, green chile paste, and salt
Place the chicken in the bowl, and rub with the mixture
Place the chicken in the baking dish, and broil 20 minutes, or until chicken juices run clear
